title: A Tribute to Tom and Liz #TheBlacklist
author: Real Scorsese
comment: You've done them proud. Great series. Started watching  them  again just watched the one when Tom dies cried like a baby. Again Great post.

This was an absolutely superb edit. You didn’t just encapsulate Tom and Liz’s Journey, you did the entire trajectory of her relationship with Readington along with the dynamic between Readington and Tom which turned out to be very ironic because despite how much they hated each other and their fraught history when they actually were willing to put aside their differences and work together for the common goal they made a really good team
This is incredible, thank you so much for making this❤️
I loved  this  couple so much! I so wanted the writers not to kill Tom, even if he disappeared from the show for a while,come back to have his happy with Liz and Agnes.
description:
From season 1 to season 5, Tom Keen and Elizabeth Keen have been the most important characters of “The Blacklist.”
It was a real privilege for me to make this tribute to them, my favorite characters. I hope you appreciate my work. I did my best.
